name: Rolling Head Game Demo
description:
This is a prototype demo for an unfinished game that might unfortunately never get a full release. I hope you will enjoy it! 

Play as a rolling head seeking its body in a silly world made of Classical Arts! 
Experience an atypical and cruel gameplay, with a rich variety of levels and adventures.

You can play the game with your keyboard or with an Xbox controller. 

Cheat: press the "U" key in the level selection screen to unlock every level.

A game by Adrien Poncet, Slymane Houzali, Lucas Bernard, Boris Kolimaga
